005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.util;
007
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.net.URL;
010
011import javax.xml.transform.Source;
012import javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource;
013
014import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
015
016public final class XmlUtil {
017
018  private XmlUtil() {
019    // disable construction
020  }
021
022  /**
023   * Create a {@link Source} based on the provided {@code url}.
024   * <p>
025   * The caller of this method must ensure that the stream associated with this
026   * source is closed.
027   *
028   * @param url
029   *          the URL to use for the source
030   * @return a new source
031   * @throws IOException
032   *           if an error occurred while creating the underlying stream
033   */
034  @SuppressWarnings("resource") // user of source is expected to close
035  @NonNull
036  public static StreamSource getStreamSource(@NonNull URL url) throws IOException {
037    return new StreamSource(url.openStream(), url.toString());
038  }
039}
